snippet: O'CONNELL--Patricia, 85, Broadway Actress, passed away Saturday, May 14th after a long chronic lung infection. Lifelong New Yorker, part of the New York theater community since she was 18. Viewing at Frank E. Campbell, Thursday 2-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Friday 10:30am at St. Jean Baptiste Church. Burial to follow. Donations to the Actors Fund or St. Judes Hospital. 1/3
lead_paragraph: O'CONNELL--Patricia, 85, Broadway Actress, passed away Saturday, May 14th after a long chronic lung infection. Lifelong New Yorker, part of the New York theater community since she was 18. Viewing at Frank E. Campbell, Thursday 2-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Friday 10:30am at St. Jean Baptiste Church. Burial to follow. Donations to the Actors Fund or St. Judes Hospital. 1/3
